module.name: single_part_representation
module.keywords: module, single part, minimum part characterization

purpose.p: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the representation of the data that specifies a single part. This modules specifies the minimum capability for description of parts and of their versions, expected with implementations.
purpose.note: The considered parts may be of arbitrary complexity and actually be assemblies. However, representation of the composition of such assemblies is out of the scope of this module.

inscope.li: identification of a part and of its versions;
representation of the shape of the part with an external file;
representation of the properties of a part version;
identification of the documents that provide information about the part or its versions.

outscope.li: management data other than the data characterizing the owner of the id of a part; This functionality may be added in a module that uses the present module.
representation of the shape of a part with geometric constructs included in the data set.

uof.name: Single_part_representation
uof.description: The Single part representation UOF specifies the data structure for a representation of a part, of its versions, of their shape within external files, of their properties and of their associated documentation.
